title: Ride Concepts Launches First-Ever MTB Helmets: Deploy and Dissent
content:
Ride Concepts introduces the Deploy and Dissent: two all-new half-lid helmets. Whether it’s hitting all-day trail loops or dropping into full-gas enduro descents, these helmets deliver premium protection, bold style, and rider-first comfort. Lightweight, fully featured, and ready to send.

 

DEPLOY

Lightweight and breathable without compromising on protection, Deploy is engineered for XC and Trail riders who put in big miles and demand confidence when the trail gets technical. A full polycarbonate shell with lower hard-body coverage increases durability, while the MIPS® Evolve Core rotational management system provides next-level crash protection. A finely tuned Flow-thru™ ventilation system with 16 vents keeps airflow high and temps low.

Quick Hits

  • Flow-thru™ ventilation with 16 large intake and exhaust ports
  • In-mold EPS construction with full polycarbonate coverage
  • Full lower hard-body shell for added durability and protection
  • MIPS® Evolve Core system to manage rotational energy in a crash
  • Multi-position indexing visor with secure goggle stow
  • FS2™ micro-adjust fit system for a customizable dialed-in fit
  • Premium moisture-wicking padding and reflective webbing
  • Deploy MSRP: $140.00 USD / $190.00CAD / 140 EUR

DISSENT

Aggressive terrain calls for a helmet that’s just as intense. Enter Dissent—Ride Concepts’ new high-performance lid for enduro, all-mountain, and gravity riders. It’s overbuilt in the best way possible: a tough 4-piece shell with extended polycarbonate coverage, oversized venting, and goggle-friendly features make it your go-to for park laps, race day, and every descent in between.
The MIPS® Evolve Core protects against rotational forces during impact, while the FS6™ integrated fit system offers a locked-in feel you can fine-tune on the fly. Add in a Fidlock® magnetic buckle, X-Static® anti-odor padding, and a burly Link™ visor mount, and you’ve got a helmet that’s as fearless as you are.

Quick Hits

  • Lightweight, durable 4 PC shell with in-mold EPS and oversized venting
  • 15 massive vents with internal airflow channeling
  • Full lower hard-body polycarbonate coverage
  • MIPS® Evolve Core rotational energy management
  • FS6™ shell-integrated micro-adjust fit system
  • Fidlock® magnetic snap buckle for quick, secure closure
  • Quick-release strap adjusters and reflective polyester webbing
  • X-Static® XT2™ comfort pads with permanent anti-odor silver thread
  • Multi-position visor with goggle stow and Link™ secure mount
  • Dissent MSRP: $190.00 USD / $245.00 CAD / 190 EUR
